name: Three-Objects
description: Tests if three objects were found
query: findall(Bundle, (owl_has(A,rdf:type,knowrob:'CRAMPerceive'),owl_has(A,knowrob:designator,DesID),owl_has(A,knowrob:endTime,Time),rdf_split_url(_, E, DesID),mang_des_perc_name(E, Name),Bundle=[Name, Time]),_AllObjects), filter_names(_AllObjects,_Objects), get_objects(_Objects, ObjectsFound), get_ntp(_Objects, NTP).
